items.title: The Sapporo Beer Museum
items.description: was opened in 1987 in a former brewery from the Meiji Period

items.title: Mount Moiwa
items.description: Mount Moiwa is one of several small, forested mountains southwest of central Sapporo.

items.title: Sapporo Teine Ski Resort
items.description: is the largest of several medium sized ski resorts on the outskirts of Sapporo.
